languages.text: {n}Маражай взирает на вас с насмешливой снисходительностью.{/n} "Признаю, ты изрядно повеселил{mf||а} меня, {name}. {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Сдал{mf|ся|ась} и сбежал{mf||а}{/d} без единого слова! Можно ли унизить себя более, чем это сделал{mf||а} ты?" {n}Друкари смеется с искренним наслаждением.{/n} "А, мне даже не хочется марать об тебя руки после этого! Можешь жить — со славой никчемной трусливой твари".
languages.translation_comment: Если романс сломан на мини-ревности с компаньоном ДЛЦ

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай взирает на вас с насмешливой снисходительностью.{/n} "Признаю, ты изрядно повеселил{mf||а} меня, {name}. {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Сдал{mf|ся|ась} и сбежал{mf||а}{/d} без единого слова! Можно ли унизить себя более, чем это сделал{mf||а} ты?" {n}Друкари смеется с искренним наслаждением.{/n} "А, мне даже не хочется марать об тебя руки после этого! Можешь жить — со славой никчемной трусливой твари".

languages.translation_comment: Если романс сломан на мини-ревности с компаньоном ДЛЦ

languages.text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай взирает на вас с насмешливой снисходительностью.{/n} "Признаю, ты изрядно повеселил{mf||а} меня, {name}. {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Сдал{mf|ся|ась} и сбежал{mf||а}{/d} без единого слова! Можно ли унизить себя более, чем это сделал{mf||а} ты?" {n}Друкари смеется с искренним наслаждением.{/n} "А, мне даже не хочется марать об тебя руки после этого! Можешь жить — со славой никчемной трусливой твари".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te observa con una condescendencia burlona.{/n} «Admito que me he divertido contigo, {name}. ¡Has {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}perdido los nervios y huido{/d} sin decir palabra! Te has humillado tan profundamente que no puedo imaginar una degradación mayor». {n}El Drukhari ríe con sincero deleite.{/n} «Ah, ¡después de eso ni siquiera deseo mancharme las manos con tu sangre! Puedes vivir, con la ignominia de ser un desecho cobarde y despreciable».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたをあざ笑うかのように見下す。{/n}「お前が俺様を大いに楽しませたことは認めよう、{name}。お前は{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}勇気を失い、逃げ出した{/d}。言葉一つ残さずにな！これ以上の屈辱はないほどに、自らを貶めたようだな」{n}デュカーリは実に楽し気に笑った。{/n}「ああ、これではお前は殺す価値すらない！生かしておいてやろう。無価値で臆病な惨めな人間という不名誉を背負って生きろ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはあなたをあざ笑うかのように見下す。{/n}「お前が俺様を大いに楽しませたことは認めよう、{name}。お前は{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}勇気を失い、逃げ出した{/d}。言葉一つ残さずにな！これ以上の屈辱はないほどに、自らを貶めたようだな」{n}デュカーリは実に楽し気に笑った。{/n}「ああ、これではお前は殺す価値すらない！生かしておいてやろう。無価値で臆病な惨めな人間という不名誉を背負って生きろ」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，目光中满是嘲弄与傲慢。{/n}“我得承认，你确实让我开心得不行，{name}。你{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}被吓破了胆，落荒而逃{/d}，甚至连句话都不敢说出口！你彻头彻尾地羞辱了你自己，就连我都想象不出比这更卑劣的行为。”{n}玛拉斋放声大笑，笑声中充满了真诚的愉悦。{/n}“啊，我甚至都不想杀你了，免得脏了我的手！你可以继续活下去——带着懦弱与耻辱，像个毫无价值的渣滓一样，继续活下去吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sieht dich mit spöttischer Herablassung an.{/n} "Ich gebe zu, Ihr habt mich sehr amüsiert, {name}. Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}habt die Nerven verloren und seid weggelaufen{/d}, ohne ein Wort zu sagen! Ihr habt Euch selbst derart gründlich gedemütigt, dass selbst mir keine größere Erniedrigung einfällt." {n}Der Drukhari lacht genüsslich.{/n} "Ah, ich will mir nicht einmal mehr die Hände schmutzig machen, indem ich Euch töte! Ihr dürft leben ... mit der Schande einer wertlosen und feigen Jammergestalt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous lance un regard aussi moqueur que condescendant.{/n} « Je dois avouer que vous m'amusez beaucoup, {name}. Quand je pense que vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}perdu votre sang-froid et fui{/d} sans même dire un mot ! Vous vous êtes {mf|couvert|couverte} de honte à tel point que je n'arrive pas à imaginer de plus cuisante humiliation. » {n}Le Drukhari éclate d'un rire sincèrement exultant.{/n} « Après ça, je n'ai même pas envie de m'abaisser à vous tuer ! Vous continuerez donc à vivre... dans l'ignominie, comme {mf|le|la} misérable lâche que vous êtes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, sana alaycı bir horgörüyle bakıyor.{/n} "Beni bir hayli eğlendirdiğini itiraf etmem gerek {name}. {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Cesaretini kaybedip{/d} tek bir söz bile etmeden kaçtın! Kendini tepeden tırnağa küçük düşürdün. Bundan daha fazla alçalabileceğini hayal edemiyorum." {n}Drukhari, içten bir keyifle kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Böyle bir şeyin ardından seni öldürerek ellerimi kirletmek bile istemiyorum. Beş para etmeyen korkaklara layık rezilliğinle yaşamaya devam edebilirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at you with mocking condescension.{/n} "I admit you have amused me greatly, {name}. You {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}lost your nerve and ran away{/d} without so much as a word! You have humiliated yourself so thoroughly, I can conceive of no deeper degradation." {n}The Drukhari laughs with genuine relish.{/n} "Ah, I do not even wish to sully my hands by killing you after that! You may live — with all the ignominy of a worthless, cowardly wretch."
